title: Formula to Find $$x_2$$ with $$x_0=0.6$$
text: To compute $$x_2$$, substitute the value of $$x_1$$ into $$x_2={x_1}^2+x_1-2$$.
speech: To compute  x sub 2 , substitute the value of  x sub 1  into  x sub 2 is equal to, x sub 1 squared plus x sub 1 minus 2 .
